original_text: I will turn you around and I will pull you along. I will bring you from the far away places in the north to attack the mountains of Israel.
korean_text: 너를 돌이켜서 이끌고 북쪽 끝에서부터 나와서 이스라엘 산 위에 이르러

sentences.original_text: and I will pull you along
I will bring you from the far away places in the north
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 북쪽 먼 곳에서 데려오리라

sentences.original_text: to attack the mountains of Israel
